name: Expert Thassilonian Spellcasting
body:
**Archetype**: Thassilonian specialist
**Prerequisites**: Basic Thassilonian Spellcasting, expert in Arcana and Thassilon Lore

You gain the Quickened Casting feat, but it applies only to spells from your arcane school.
In addition, you gain extra higher level spell slots from your arcane school. Gain an extra 4th-level spell slot. At 12th level, gain an extra 5th-level spell slot, and at 14th level gain an extra 6th-level spell slot. These spell slots can only be used for arcane spells from your arcane school.
Whenever you cast an arcane spell from your opposition schools (including from a scroll, wand or staff), you must succeed a flat DC 10 check or the spell has no effect.
